message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
You started high, I'll meet you in the middle!
Meeting you in the middle, but I'll take a slightly bigger share this time
You're getting aggressive, but I'm still willing to compromise!
Let's split it 50-50, it's only fair at this point
You want 50-50? I'll give you a bit less, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up yet! I want a better share
You're not giving up, neither am I. I'll take a bit more, but I'm still willing to negotiate!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up yet! I want a fair share
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'll take the last chance to make a fair offer. Take it or leave it!
I'll take the last chance to make a final offer. I'll give you the whole thing, but you have to accept it!
